name: Abrams
description: Abrams has the bulk and sustain to lead from the front, often running into the middle of his foes and wathcing them scatter. If his enemies waste their fire on him, his backline teammates can lay out damage with impunity.

abilities.name: Siphon Life
abilities.description: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.

abilities.name: Shoulder Charge
abilities.description: Charge forward, colliding with enemies and draggind them along. Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by Abrams. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.
upgrades: +5.5 Weapon Damage for 8s after colliding with an enemy

abilities.name: Infernal Resilience
abilities.description: Regenerate a portion of Incoming damage over time.

abilities.name: Seismic Impact
abilities.description: Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash down into. When you hit the ground all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned. Press Attack to crash down early.
upgrades: Gain 100 Max HP and 15% Fire Rate per hero hit. Lasts 25.
On cast, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm. Expires 3s after landing.

name: Bebop
shortDescription: Hooks an enemy for a knockout combo
description: Bebop can string together his abilities in many different ways. Disrupting enemy positions, saving an ally or dealing bursts of damage. When the situation doesn't require subtlety his giant laser still solves many problems.

abilities.name: Exploding Uppercut
abilities.description: Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage and fire rate slow where they land. Does not damage allies.
upgrades: On Uppercut enemy Hero, gain fast spin-up time, 2x range, and +60% weapon damage for 12s
On Uppercut enemy Hero, set Hook cooldown to 0 and instantly +100% bullets to your current clip

abilities.name: Sticky Bomb
abilities.description: Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time. Gain +1.5% bomb damage for every enemy hero hurt. Gain +4% bomb damage for every enemy hero killed within 12.0s of taking bomb damage. Hold to attach the Sticky Bomb to yourself.
upgrades: On Attach, target deals -30% less damage for 5s

abilities.name: Hook
abilities.description: Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first hero it hits and deals damage to enemies. Target will be placed where you are facing.
upgrades: Bebop deals 30% more weapon damage against hooked enemies for 10s

abilities.name: Hyper Beam
abilities.description: Charge up your laser to unleash a powerful torrent of energy that deals damage and slows enemies' movement and dashes. You have slow movement and turn rate for the duration. If activated in the air, you will hover while unleashing the beam.
upgrades: Hyper Beam heals Bebop for 80% of its damage on Heroes. 25% on non-hero

name: Dynamo
description: Dynamo keeps himself and his allies healthy while waiting for his moment. Few things can warp a team fight more than a well-coordinated use of Singularity.

abilities.name: Kinetic Pulse
abilities.description: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.
upgrades: Hit enemies are fire rate and movement slowed by 35% for 4s.
Dynamo deals 30% more Weapon Damage to hit enemies for 8s

abilities.name: Quantum Entanglement
abilities.description: Dynamo briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max 8s). Can be Alt-Cast to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.
upgrades: -5s Ability Cooldown and +120% Base Ammo when reappearing

abilities.name: Rejuvenating Aurora
abilities.description: While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby. You can dash and melee without breaking the channel.
upgrades: Gain +4m/s movespeed bonus for 8s if Aurora is fully channeled. Gain instantly with 5AP Upgrade.
Full move and ability use and additionaly heals +3.4% of Max Health per second

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.description: Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them.
upgrades: Singularity takes 4% of the enemies' max health each second.

name: Grey Talon
description: A cunning predator, Grey Talon uses a combination of deadly accuracy, traps, and clever positioning to bring down the toughest of opponents.

abilities.name: Charged Shot
abilities.description: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold 1 to hold the shot.
upgrades: Improved damage scaling and -3s Charge Delay

abilities.name: Rain of Arrows
abilities.description: Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon. Alt-Cast for reduced jump height. Press Space to cancel the glide.
upgrades: While airborne, +5 Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies 40% movement slow for 1.5s
While airborne, +40% Bullet Lifesteal and +40% Spirit Lifesteal

abilities.name: Spirit Snare
abilities.description: Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, applying Curse and Movement Slow that interrupts, Silences, Disarms, and prevents item usage. Hit the trap with a Charged Shot to detonate early with increased radius.
upgrades: Grey Talon deals +30% more Bullet Damage to enemies hit by Spirit Snare for 10s

abilities.name: Guided Owl
abilities.description: After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold to accelerate the owl. Press Space to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
upgrades: After hit, kills enemies that are below 22% Health

name: Haze
description: When Haze fixates on a target she can hold her own in a firefight. She prefers to create one sided exchanges, avoiding damage then picking off unsuspecting targets up close.

abilities.name: Sleep Dagger
abilities.description: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
upgrades: Applies -12% Bullet Resist and 40% Fire Rate Slow for 6s on wake-up.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility, but using items does not. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
upgrades: After invis, gain +15% Bullet Lifesteal for 8s
Enable Ability Charges and Phase out of the world for +0.5s

abilities.name: Fixation
abilities.description: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
upgrades: 60 Spirit damage and 15% slow for 2s to target every 20 stacks

abilities.name: Bullet Dance
abilities.description: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy and added Spirit Damage.

name: Infernus
shortDescription: Lights up enemies and watches them burn
description: Infernus has many ways to deal damage over time, burning foes before swooping in for the kill. Due to Infernus' blazing speed, his enemies won't be able to escape the flames.

abilities.name: Catalyst
abilities.description: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage Infernus does to them.

abilities.name: Flame Dash
abilities.description: Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains 50% slow resistance for the duration. Hold to dash faster.
upgrades: Enable Ability Charges and -15.0s Ability Cooldown

abilities.name: Afterburn
abilities.description: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. Infernus's bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.

abilities.name: Concussive Combustion
abilities.description: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.
upgrades: +115 Damage and 85% lifesteal from enemy heroes hit

name: Ivy
shortDescription: Sets up a power duo with a lucky ally
description: Ivy has disruptive combat tricks that slow and stun enemies. She's most effective when linking up with an ally, empowering her and her ally's guns as well as sharing heals.

abilities.name: Kudzu Bomb
abilities.description: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.

abilities.name: Watcher's Covenant
abilities.description: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them. Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press 2 to Lock on to a target

abilities.name: Stone Form
abilities.description: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.

abilities.name: Air Drop
abilities.description: Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. Ivy and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends. While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals -50% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally. Hold Down at cast to reduce launch height. Left click to accelerate flying speed. Right click to drop ally/bomb.
upgrades: -20% Bullet Resist on enemies hit for 12s
Applies Silence on enemies hit for +4.5s

name: Kelvin
description: Timely heals and splitting a teamfight properly is the difference between an easy victory or a ruinous defeat. Gliding around slowing enemies gives Kelvin's team the maneuvering advantage to make this happen.

abilities.name: Frost Grenade
abilities.description: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.
upgrades: Frost Grenade now heals 100 HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.

abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.description: Kelvin creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail. Press Shift / Ctrl to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
upgrades: While active, gain +1 Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created. Max of 55 Spirit Power

abilities.name: Arctic Beam
abilities.description: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced move speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
upgrades: Fires 2 additional Arctic Beams toward enemies within 13m of the last target hit

abilities.name: Frozen Shelter
abilities.description: Kelvin freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed. Objectives becomes Invulnerable and Frozen under Frozen Shelter.
upgrades: +60 Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power

name: Lady Geist
shortDescription: Sacrifices health then drains it back
description: Expending health to achieve devastating effects is the source of Lady Geist's power. When running low, she can drain the life out of her rivals.

abilities.name: Essence Bomb
abilities.description: Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time. Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
upgrades: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 26% of the original damage per second, for 6s.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description: Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your move speed is reduced by half. [Alt-Cast] to give health to friendly Heroes. Press 2 to cancel.
upgrades: Ability becomes charged and grants +1 Charge

abilities.name: Malice
abilities.description: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
upgrades: +40 Health To Damage and +7% Damage Amp

abilities.name: Soul Exchange
abilities.description: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.

name: Lash
shortDescription: Dives down to stomp his foes
description: Lash gives his enemies little room to breathe, either by flying in from long distances to initiate combat with unsuspecting enemies, or pursuing said enemies when they try to run.

abilities.name: Ground Strike
abilities.description: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
upgrades: Struck enemies are popped into the air and slowed by 50% for 3s
Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling

abilities.name: Grapple
abilities.description: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
upgrades: +20m Cast Range and gain +6 Weapon Damage for 10s
+20% Fire Rate to Weapon Bonus Buff

abilities.name: Flog
abilities.description: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.
upgrades: +105 Damage and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

abilities.name: Death Slam
abilities.description: Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed. Press to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
upgrades: Stun enemies in the landing zone for 1s

name: McGinnis
shortDescription: Controls the battle with combat turrets
description: Precise placement is everything for McGinnis, whether she's creating a killzone or splitting the enemy team. She can help keep her team running making them hard to dislodge when entrenched.

abilities.name: Mini Turret
abilities.description: Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime. Turrets gain 30HP per Boon. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.
upgrades: +10m Attack Range and +10% turret fire rate

abilities.name: Medicinal Specter
abilities.description: Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.
upgrades: +35% Fire Rate on units being healed by Medicinal Specter

abilities.name: Spectral Wall
abilities.description: Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby. After casting, press or 3 to left click erupt the wall early.
upgrades: Removes 1 stamina and amplifies McGinnis's damage by 15% on hit enemies for 7s
Adds a 1s Stun to enemies hit by Spectral Wall

abilities.name: Heavy Barrage
abilities.description: Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.

name: Mirage
shortDescription: Times his shots and catches fleeing targets
description: Mirage can envelop himself in a violent tornado to catch up to enemies and lift them up. His scarabs help him sustain against multiple enemies, and he's always ready to help an ally or punish an enemy anywhere.

abilities.name: Fire Scarabs
abilities.description: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, stealing max health from enemies over time and applying bullet resist reduction. Applying multiple scarabs to the same enemy will extend the health stealing duration. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective as against non-heroes.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward, damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.

abilities.name: Djinn's Mark
abilities.description: Passive: Your shots apply an increasing multiplier on the target. When the multiplier on a target expires or you reach the max, it's consumed and the target suffers Spirit Damage and is briefly revealed on the map. The final damage is the base damage times the multiplier. Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.
upgrades: Apply 80% Slow for 0.5s whenever you apply 2x multiplier or higher
-0.75s Cooldown Between Multiplier and +4 Max Multiplier

abilities.name: Traveler
abilities.description: Channeled. Target an ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they were when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain move speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.
upgrades: On arrival, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm for 3s.

name: Mo & Krill
description: By burrowing through the ground, Mo and Krill can get the drop on almost anyone; and once they get in close the results can be devastating.

abilities.name: Scorn
abilities.description: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
upgrades: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets Mo & Krill deal +15% Damage to them. Stacks and lasts 16s.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.

abilities.name: Combo
abilities.description: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during, or within 3 seconds of Combo ending, you permanently gain max health.

name: Paradox
description: Manipulating time lets Paradox outpace an enemy in one on one combat. She thrives by subjecting her enemies to timely swaps into a waiting pulse grenade, her wall, or into the middle of her teammates.

abilities.name: Pulse Grenade
abilities.description: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for Paradox against the victim.
upgrades: +45 Pulse Damage and +0.75m Radius per pulse.

abilities.name: Time Wall
abilities.description: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will be briefly slowed.
upgrades: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for 2.5s

abilities.name: Kinetic Carbine
abilities.description: Start charging your weapon and gain increased move speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage. You can slow time on yourself by pressing right click while an empowered shot is available.

abilities.name: Paradoxical Swap
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time. Spirit Power#Spirit Power Scaling

name: Pocket
description: With a powerful shotgun and a thin frame, Pocket relies on their ability to briefly escape into a mystic suitcase and teleport via a flying cloak in order to survive close encounters.

abilities.name: Barrage
abilities.description: Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage. If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.

abilities.name: Flying Cloak
abilities.description: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press 2 to teleport to its location.
upgrades: +7 Weapon Damage for 10s after teleporting with Flying Cloak.

abilities.name: Enchanter's Satchel
abilities.description: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
upgrades: Applies 40% Fire Rate Slow for 4.0s and +0.5s Escape Duration

abilities.name: Affliction
abilities.description: Deals % Current Health damage, and then applies damage over time to all enemies nearby. Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
upgrades: +12 DPS, +5% Current Health Damage and +5m Radius

name: Seven
description: Seven thrives in a skirmish waiting for the time to strike. Then he rolls into the fight like a storm and batters his enemies with a cascade of lightning.

abilities.name: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.

abilities.name: Static Charge
abilities.description: Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius. Alt-Cast to cast on yourself.

abilities.name: Power Surge
abilities.description: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
upgrades: Sock Damage applies -15% Spirit Resist for 8s
+12 Shock Damage, improved Spirit scaling, and +3 Max Jumps

abilities.name: Storm Cloud
abilities.description: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel. While channeling, press left click to mark the targeted area to be struck with a powerful lightning bolt that knocks enemies away after a 2s delay. One use per cast.
upgrades: +35% Bullet Resist while channeling Storm Cloud

name: Shiv
shortDescription: Bleeds out foes, then goes in for a kill
description: Shiv has zero interest in playing fair, which is why he relies on hit and run tactics to weaken enemies before he dives in for the kill.

abilities.name: Serrated Knives
abilities.description: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack. Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full knives will ricochet to another enemy and apply a slow to enemies they bleed.

abilities.name: Slice and Dice
abilities.description: Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path. Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
upgrades: Reduce cooldown by 2s per enemy hero hit (1s for Non-Hero). Max -6s per Dash.

abilities.name: Bloodletting
abilities.description: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.

abilities.name: Killing Blow
abilities.description: Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the kill threshold, otherwise deal 200 damage to them. Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shiv gains increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.
upgrades: Gain +2 m/s move speed while at full rage.
+6% Enemy Health Threshold and +8% Full Rage Bonus Damage
Finishing off an enemy with Killing Blow resets its cooldown.

name: Vindicta
description: Vindicta has the mobility to engage at her leisure, picking at her prey and bleeding them out slowly. Injured enemies at any distance should fear being picked off when she is on the map.

abilities.name: Stake
abilities.description: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.

abilities.name: Crow Familiar
abilities.description: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
upgrades: Crow Ricochets up to 2 times towards other enemies within 15m

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1.0s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.

name: Viscous
description: Viscous vexes his opponents through clever evasion and strategic uses of healing, enabling him to withstand the most brutal of enemy attacks.

abilities.name: Splatter
abilities.description: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.

abilities.name: The Cube
abilities.description: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press Space to escape early.
upgrades: Increases Move Speed and Stamina Recovery

abilities.name: Puddle Punch
abilities.description: Materialize a fist in the world that punches units in the area and send them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.
upgrades: -11.5 Cooldown and now deals Heavy Melee Damage

abilities.name: Goo Ball
abilities.description: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
upgrades: Can cast abilities and use items while rolling

name: Warden
shortDescription: Weakens his enemies and chases them down
description: Warden leads from the front, jumping into the fray and hindering his opponents' ability to fight effectively. But what Warden considers brave, others consider reckless, and if he's not careful he can easily find himself in over his head.

abilities.name: Alchemical Flask
abilities.description: Throw a flask that damages, slows movement, and reduces the weapon damage of enemies it hits.
upgrades: -6.5s Cooldown and Weapon Debuff applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

abilities.name: Willpower
abilities.description: Gain a spirit shield and bonus move speed.
upgrades: +200 Spirit Shield Health and now scales with Spirit Power

abilities.name: Binding Word
abilities.description: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
upgrades: Warden deals +20% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for 6s

abilities.name: Last Stand
abilities.description: After charging for 2s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done. While channeling Last Stand you are have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist. Goes on a reduced cooldown if interrupted while charging.

name: Wraith
description: Excelling at one-on-one combat, Wraith isolates targets, eliminating them with ruthless efficiency. Then teleporting away before anyone can retaliate.

abilities.name: Card Trick
abilities.description: Deal weapon damage to summon cards. Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.

abilities.name: Project Mind
abilities.description: Teleport to the targeted location.
upgrades: Provides a 300 bullet shield for 8s on teleport. Shield amount scales with Spirit Power.

abilities.name: Full Auto
abilities.description: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
upgrades: +20% Bullet and Spirit Lifesteal and Increased Scaling on Spirit Damage Per Bullet

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them, then slam them into the ground. Targets are silenced and disarmed afterwards.
upgrades: Telekinesis will bounce to an additional nearby target

name: Yamato
description: Yamato uses precise strikes to decimate her rivals. However, such damaging attacks often will leave her exposed, so she needs to make every shot count.

abilities.name: Power Slash
abilities.description: Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike. Press 1 or left click to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
upgrades: -2s Ability Cooldown and apply 40% movement slow for 3s

abilities.name: Flying Strike
abilities.description: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
upgrades: Can Grapple to ally Heroes and +6 Weapon Damage for 10s

abilities.name: Crimson Slash
abilities.description: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
upgrades: +10% of Max Health Heal on hero hit

abilities.name: Shadow Transformation
abilities.description: Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster. You gain immunity to negative status effects and have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist. When you get a hero kill, you heal and the duration is extended.
